optProblem{id: 1, sense: min{}}.
constraint{
  id: 1,
  problem: 1,
  op: lte{},
  constant: 10,
}.
constraintCoefficient{constraint: 1, var: "chairs", val: 1}.
constraintCoefficient{constraint: 1, var: "tables", val: 3}.
constraint{
  id: 2,
  problem: 1,
  op: lte{},
  constant: 8,
}.
constraintCoefficient{constraint: 2, var: "chairs", val: 2}.
constraintCoefficient{constraint: 2, var: "tables", val: 1}.
objectiveCoefficient{
  problem: 1,
  var: "chairs",
  coefficient: 20,
}.
objectiveCoefficient{
  problem: 1,
  var: "tables",
  coefficient: 30,
}.
----
application/datalog
objectiveVal{val: 128}.
solutionVarVal{val: 2.4, var: "tables"}.
solutionVarVal{val: 2.8, var: "chairs"}.
solution{outcome: "optimal"}.
